name: angelic-blade
description: An angelic-blade that makes the angel stronger. Give this to your angel to make him win!.

name: manual
description:
You are on the side of the angels. You have to `summon` an angel to the arena and battle the demon, who is too strong for you to beat! 
 Supported commands are :-
	`look *[Entity]`,
	`summon [Area] [NPC]`,
	`call [Item] [Area]`,
	`take [Item]`,
	`drop [Item]`,
	`give [Item] [Area]`,
	`stats [Entity]`,
	`inventory [Entity]`,
	`battle [NPC] [NPC]`
